source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.
source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality

items.title: Managing your Energy
items.headline: A Guide From the Kabbalah
objectives_summary: Personal development through identifying core mental/emotional energies, using the wisdom of Kabbalah.

items.title: Wiccan Basics
items.headline: A wonderful overview and exploration of the Wiccan faith, its philosophies, foundations and applications.
objectives_summary: This course starts with the basics of the Wiccan faith and builds from there. It Explores the foundations, theologies, principles and attributes that formulate the foundations.

items.title: Yoga Teacher Training 100 Hour - Category Three
items.headline: Sacred Spiral Yoga - Altered States of Awareness and Sacred Sound
objectives_summary: This Category Three of our 100 Yoga Teacher Training covers Mantra and Sacred Sound, Meditation, Contemplation, Relaxation and Visualization.

items.title: How to Connect With Your Angels Certified Course
items.headline: Learn how to connect and communicate with your angels and receive clear guidance on the next steps of your journey.
objectives_summary: Strengthen your connection with angels
Instantly learn how to connect and call upon your angels for help
Understand the role angels play in our lives

items.title: 105: Genetic Mutations and Intelligent Design
items.headline: Which is more Scientific? Evolution or Intelligent Design?
objectives_summary: Know the Difference Between Micro and Macro Evolution
Support the Argument for Intelligent Design

items.title: The Bible
items.headline: What It Is, How We Got It, And Is It The Real Thing?
objectives_summary: You will learn how the Bible has been passed down through the centuries and why the documents can be trusted.
By the end of the course you will have a greater appreciation of the Bible and why it is unique.

items.title: Christian Coaching in Your Church
items.headline: Become a mentor someone can follow. You may be surprised to find someone may be secretly looking to become your mentee.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will know how to find the right person in your church for you to mentor.
You will know how to take the lead with your mentee to lead them to a more productive and satisfying Christian life.
You will know how to blend the elements of friendship and mentoring into a pattern that leaves a positive pattern for a lifetime.

items.title: Mysticism: The Apex of Christian Spirituality.
items.headline: An introduction to mysticism and the spiritual journey within Christianity which leads to it..
objectives_summary: Understand the three major stages in path of Christian Spiritual Ascent in general terms.

items.title: Developing A Close Relationship with God:  A Simple Method

visible_instructors.job_title: Spiritual Life Coach, Christian Minister, Author & Speaker
visible_instructors.name: Sandy
visible_instructors.title: Sandy Walker

items.headline: Easy steps to go deeper in your relationship with God this week! Anyone can do these - not complicated or boring!
objectives_summary: After you take this course you will be confident that you know how to connect with God deeply each day.
You will also be able to focus your attention so you can pay attention to God without distractions.
You’ll learn to recognize His voice and you’ll be familiar with many ways that God communicates with you.

items.title: The Most Effective Prayer Method Using Affirmative Prayer
items.headline: A prayer approach that deeply connects you to God and gives you a true knowing that your miracles are on the way!
objectives_summary: The ultimate guide to a powerful prayer method that works!
A step-by-step guide on how to create and use Affirmative Prayer
How to raise your vibration to attract the blessings you desire

items.title: 2020VISION - New You Course
items.headline: Life Planning, Vision Tracking and Time Management for Christians
objectives_summary: Life Planning
Time Management
Goal Tracking

items.title: Mindfulness Essentials Practitioner Course
items.headline: Transform your life experience - SIGN UP and learn the essentials from Mindfulness Expert Darren Cockburn
objectives_summary: Discover effective techniques to bring mindfulness into everyday activities
Use digital devices consciously and mindfully
Develop greater levels of awareness and become more accepting

items.title: Your Complete Palmistry Online Diploma - Detailed Training
items.headline: Discover Hidden Secrets and Life Mysteries That Are Held In Your Hands
objectives_summary: Learn the ancient divination method of chiromancy.  Understand how the lines and mounts on the palms tell of your past, your potential, and likely future.
Learn the skills that enable you to give full and authoritative Palm Readings, even set up your own business!
Gain an indepth understanding of every aspect needed for Palmistry - the lines, the mounts, loops, rings, marks and patterns, hand sizes, shapes and much more

items.title: Becoming Shaman
items.headline: Come into Alignment with your Higher Self, and Coach Others to do the same
objectives_summary: Shamanic Healing Energy(TM): An intuition based energy healing modality
Mediumship
Enhance intuition and psychic abilities

items.title: Hearing God For Yourself and Others
items.headline: Cultivating a Conversational Relationship with Jesus
objectives_summary: Students will have more confidence in the voice of God and will enter into a deeper experience of Him.

items.title: Understand QURAN Course - English Translation & Explanation
items.headline: Learn QURAN With English Translation & Explanation Of Selected Passages Of Last Holy Book QURAN & Understand QURAN ISLAM
objectives_summary: Understand Translation,Explanation,Themes, Of Selected Quranic Passages, Understand How Human Beings Are Better Than Angels
Understand The Reason Of Creation Of Mankind,Identify Importance Of The Themes Of the Quranic Passages, Deeply Learn ALLAH's Distinctive Attributes, And How Only ALLAH Is Worthy Of Worship ,
ALLAH's relationship with HIS Creations, ALLAH's Relationship With HIS Messengers
